content.description: A solution is prepared by combining <math alttext="1.0 liter" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>L</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="0.50 molar H C l O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.50</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>HClO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> with <math alttext="1.0 liter" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>L</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="0.50 molar K C l O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.50</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>KClO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. The <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of the solution is <math alttext="2.0" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
content.question: The value of <math alttext="K sub b" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="C l O 2 with a negative 1 charge" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>ClO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> is closest to which of the following?

choices.label: <math alttext="1.0 times 10 to the exponent of negative 14" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>1.0</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>14</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="1.0 times 10 to the exponent of negative 12" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>1.0</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>12</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="1.0 times 10 to the exponent of negative 7" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>1.0</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>7</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="1.0 times 10 to the exponent of negative 2" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>1.0</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

content.answer: <math alttext="1.0 times 10 to the exponent of negative 12" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>1.0</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>12</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
